mapper.sql: select ClassStartExam.id as ClassStartExam_id , ClassStartExam.class_id as ClassStartExam_class_id , ClassStartExam.course_id as ClassStartExam_course_id , ClassStartExam.createTime as ClassStartExam_createTime , ClassStartExam.startTime as ClassStartExam_startTime , ClassStartExam.duration as ClassStartExam_duration , ClassStartExam.notify as ClassStartExam_notify ,ClassInfo.className as ClassInfo_className,Course.courseName as Course_courseName from ClassStartExam as ClassStartExam left join ClassInfo as ClassInfo on ClassStartExam.class_id=ClassInfo.id left join Course as Course on Course.id=ClassStartExam.course_id
